text:
The binary distribution of 1.2RC2 does not contain the ant configuration file 
build.xml

One result is that the command
ant export
does not work.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
gregor@apache.org
text:
i manually removed them last time, my bad. the build script does the right thing:

  <target name="prepare-dist-src" depends="distclean">

    <mkdir dir="${dist.src.dir}"/>

    <copy todir="${dist.src.dir}">
      <fileset dir=".">
        <exclude name="build.properties"/>
        <exclude name=".classpath"/>
        <exclude name=".cvsignore"/>
        <exclude name=".project"/>
      </fileset>
    </copy>

  </target>
